trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework Class Library or any other class library may include other types that aren't CLS-compliant; for example:
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 类库或任何其他类库可能包含不符合 CLS 的其他类型；例如：

trans-unit.source: Boxed value types.
trans-unit.target: 装箱的值类型。

trans-unit.source: The following C# example creates a class that has a public property of type `int`* named `Value`. Because an `int`* is a boxed value type, the compiler flags it as non-CLS-compliant.
trans-unit.target: 下面的 C# 示例创建一个具有名为 `Value` 的 `int`* 类型的公共属性的类。由于 `int`* 是一个装箱的值类型，因此编译器将其标记为不符合 CLS。

trans-unit.source: Typed references, which are special constructs that contain a reference to an object and a reference to a type.
trans-unit.target: 类型化的引用是一个特殊构造，它包含一个对对象的引用和一个对类型的引用。

trans-unit.source: If a type is not CLS-compliant, you should apply the [CLSCompliantAttribute](xref:System.CLSCompliantAttribute) attribute with an *isCompliant* parameter with a value of `false` to it.
trans-unit.target: 如果类型不符合 CLS，则需对其应用 *isCompliant* 值为 `false` 的 [CLSCompliantAttribute](xref:System.CLSCompliantAttribute) 特性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [CLSCompliantAttribute attribute](#the-clscompliantattribute-attribute) section.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 [CLSCompliantAttribute 特性](#the-clscompliantattribute-attribute)部分。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the problem of CLS compliance in a method signature and in generic type instantiation.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例说明了方法签名和泛型类型实例化中 CLS 遵从性的问题。

trans-unit.source: It defines an `InvoiceItem` class with a property of type [UInt32](xref:System.UInt32), a property of type [Nullable(Of UInt32)](xref:System.Nullable%601), and a constructor with parameters of type `UInt32` and `Nullable(Of UInt32)`.
trans-unit.target: 它定义一个具有类型为 [UInt32](xref:System.UInt32) 的属性和类型为 [Nullable(Of UInt32)](xref:System.Nullable%601) 的属性的 `InvoiceItem` 类，以及一个具有类型为 `UInt32` 和 `Nullable(Of UInt32)` 的参数的构造函数。

trans-unit.source: You get four compiler warnings when you try to compile this example.
trans-unit.target: 您尝试编译此示例时会收到四个编译器警告。

trans-unit.source: To eliminate the compiler warnings, replace the non-CLS-compliant types in the `InvoiceItem` public interface with compliant types:
trans-unit.target: 若要消除编译器警告，请将 `InvoiceItem` 公共接口中不符合 CLS 的类型替换为符合 CLS 的类型：

trans-unit.source: In addition to the specific types listed, some categories of types are not CLS compliant.
trans-unit.target: 除了列出的特定类型之外，某些类型的类别也不符合 CLS。

trans-unit.source: These include unmanaged pointer types and function pointer types.
trans-unit.target: 其中包括非托管指针类型和函数指针类型。

trans-unit.source: The following example generates a compiler warning because it uses a pointer to an integer to create an array of integers.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将生成一个编译器警告，因为它使用指向整数的指针来创建整数数组。

trans-unit.source: For CLS-compliant abstract classes (that is, classes marked as `abstract` in C#), all members of the class must also be CLS-compliant.
trans-unit.target: 对于符合 CLS 的抽象类（即在 C# 中标记为 `abstract` 的类），该类的所有成员也必须符合 CLS。

trans-unit.source: Naming conventions
trans-unit.target: 命名约定

trans-unit.source: Because some programming languages are case-insensitive, identifiers (such as the names of namespaces, types, and members) must differ by more than case.
trans-unit.target: 由于一些编程语言不区分大小写，因此标识符（例如，命名空间、类型和成员的名称）必须不仅限于大小写不同。

trans-unit.source: Two identifiers are considered equivalent if their lowercase mappings are the same.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个标识符的小写映射是相同的，则这两个标识符被视为等效。

trans-unit.source: The following C# example defines two public classes, `Person` and `person`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的 C# 示例定义两个公共类：`Person` 和 `person`。

trans-unit.source: Because they differ only by case, the C# compiler flags them as not CLS-compliant.
trans-unit.target: 由于它们只是大小写不同，因此 C# 编译器会将其标记为不符合 CLS。

trans-unit.source: Programming language identifiers, such as the names of namespaces, types, and members, must conform to the [Unicode Standard 3.0, Technical Report 15, Annex 7](http://www.unicode.org/reports/tr15/tr15-18.html).
trans-unit.target: 编程语言识别符（例如，命名空间、类型和成员的名称）必须遵照 [Unicode 标准 3.0、技术报告 15 和附件 7](http://www.unicode.org/reports/tr15/tr15-18.html)。

trans-unit.source: This means that:
trans-unit.target: 这表示：

trans-unit.source: The first character of an identifier can be any Unicode uppercase letter, lowercase letter, title case letter, modifier letter, other letter, or letter number.
trans-unit.target: 标识符的第一个字符可以是任何 Unicode 大写字母、小写字母、标题大小写字母、修饰符字母、其他字母或字母数字。

trans-unit.source: For information on Unicode character categories, see the [System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory](xref:System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory) enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关 Unicode 字符类别的信息，请参阅 [System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory](xref:System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory) 枚举。

trans-unit.source: Subsequent characters can be from any of the categories as the first character, and can also include non-spacing marks, spacing combining marks, decimal numbers, connector punctuations, and formatting codes.
trans-unit.target: 后继字符可以作为第一个字符来自任何类别，还可以包含无间隔标记、间距组合标记、十进制数字、连接器标点符号以及格式设置代码。

trans-unit.source: Before you compare identifiers, you should filter out formatting codes and convert the identifiers to Unicode Normalization Form C, because a single character can be represented by multiple UTF-16-encoded code units.
trans-unit.target: 在比较标识符之前，应筛选格式设置代码，并将标识符转换为 Unicode 范式 C，因为单个字符可由多个 UTF 16 编码的代码单位表示。

trans-unit.source: Character sequences that produce the same code units in Unicode Normalization Form C are not CLS-compliant.
trans-unit.target: 在 Unicode 范式 C 中生成相同代码单位的字符序列不符合 CLS。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a property named `Å`, which consists of the character ANGSTROM SIGN (U+212B), and a second property named `Å` which consists of the character LATIN CAPITAL LETTER A WITH RING ABOVE (U+00C5).
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义一个名为 `Å` 的属性（包含字符 ANGSTROM SIGN (U+212B)）和另一个名为 `Å` 的属性（包含字符 LATIN CAPITAL LETTER A WITH RING ABOVE (U+00C5)）。

trans-unit.source: The C# compiler flags the source code as non-CLS-compliant.
trans-unit.target: C# 编译器将源代码标记为不符合 CLS。

trans-unit.source: Member names within a particular scope (such as the namespaces within an assembly, the types within a namespace, or the members within a type) must be unique except for names that are resolved through overloading.
trans-unit.target: 特定范围内的成员名称（如程序集中的命名空间、命名空间中的类型或某类型中的成员）必须是唯一的，通过重载解析的名称除外。

trans-unit.source: This requirement is more stringent than that of the common type system, which allows multiple members within a scope to have identical names as long as they are different kinds of members (for example, one is a method and one is a field).
trans-unit.target: 此要求比常规类型系统的要求更加严格，后者允许一个范围内的多个成员在作为不同类型的成员（例如，一个是方法，一个是字段时）时，可以具有相同的名称。

trans-unit.source: In particular, for type members:
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，对于类型成员：

trans-unit.source: Fields and nested types are distinguished by name alone.
trans-unit.target: 字段和嵌套类型只能通过名称区分。

trans-unit.source: Methods, properties, and events that have the same name must differ by more than just return type.
trans-unit.target: 具有相同名称的方法、属性和事件必须具有除返回类型不同之外的其他不同之处。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the requirement that member names must be unique within their scope.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例说明了成员名称在其范围内必须是唯一的要求。

trans-unit.source: It defines a class named `Converter` that includes four members named `Conversion`.
trans-unit.target: 它定义了一个名为 `Converter` 的类，该类包括四个名为 `Conversion` 的成员。

trans-unit.source: Three are methods, and one is a property.
trans-unit.target: 其中三个是方法，一个是属性。

trans-unit.source: The method that includes an `Int64` parameter is uniquely named, but the two methods with an `Int32` parameter are not, because return value is not considered a part of a member's signature.
trans-unit.target: 包含 `Int64` 参数的方法具有唯一名称，但是，具有 `Int32` 参数的两个方法不是，因为返回值不被视为成员签名的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The `Conversion` property also violates this requirement, because properties cannot have the same name as overloaded methods.
trans-unit.target: 由于属性不能具有与重载方法相同的名称，因此 `Conversion` 属性也违反了此要求。

trans-unit.source: Individual languages include unique keywords, so languages that target the common language runtime must also provide some mechanism for referencing identifiers (such as type names) that coincide with keywords.
trans-unit.target: 各种语言都包含唯一关键字，因此面向公共语言运行时的语言还必须提供一些机制，以便引用与关键字相符的标识符（例如，类型名称）。

trans-unit.source: For example, `case` is a keyword in both C# and Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`case` 是 C# 和 Visual Basic 两者中的关键字。

trans-unit.source: However, the following Visual Basic example is able to disambiguate a class named `case` from the `case` keyword by using opening and closing braces.
trans-unit.target: 但是，下面的 Visual Basic 示例可以通过使用左大括号和右大括号将名为 `case` 的类从 `case` 关键字中消除。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the example would produce the error message, "Keyword is not valid as an identifier," and fail to compile.
trans-unit.target: 否则，该示例将生成错误消息“关键字无法用作标识符”，并且编译将失败。

trans-unit.source: The following C# example is able to instantiate the `case` class by using the @ symbol to disambiguate the identifier from the language keyword.
trans-unit.target: 下面的 C# 示例可以通过使用 `case` 符号从语言关键字中消除标识符来实例化 @ 类。

trans-unit.source: Without it, the C# compiler would display two error messages, "Type expected" and "Invalid expression term 'case'."
trans-unit.target: 如果没有该符号，C# 编译器会显示两条错误消息：“应为类型”和“无效表达式术语‘case’”。

trans-unit.source: Type conversion
trans-unit.target: 类型转换

trans-unit.source: The Common Language Specification defines two conversion operators:
trans-unit.target: 公共语言规范定义了两个转换运算符：

trans-unit.source: `op_Implicit`, which is used for widening conversions that do not result in loss of data or precision.
trans-unit.target: `op_Implicit` 用于扩大转换，不会丢失数据或精度。

trans-unit.source: For example, the [Decimal](xref:System.Decimal) structure includes an overloaded `op_Implicit` operator to convert values of integral types and [Char](xref:System.Char) values to `Decimal` values.
trans-unit.target: 例如，[Decimal](xref:System.Decimal) 结构包含一个已重载的 `op_Implicit` 运算符，将整数类型值和 [Char](xref:System.Char) 值转换为 `Decimal` 值。

trans-unit.source: `op_Explicit`, which is used for narrowing conversions that can result in loss of magnitude (a value is converted to a value that has a smaller range) or precision.
trans-unit.target: `op_Explicit` 用于收缩可能导致丢失量级（将一个值转换为一个范围更小的值）或精度的转换。

trans-unit.source: For example, the `Decimal` structure includes an overloaded `op_Explicit` operator to convert [Double](xref:System.Double) and [Single](xref:System.Single) values to `Decimal` and to convert `Decimal` values to integral values, `Double`, `Single`, and `Char`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`Decimal` 结构包含一个已重载的 `op_Explicit` 运算符，将 [Double](xref:System.Double) 和 [Single](xref:System.Single) 值转换为 `Decimal`，将 `Decimal` 值转换为整数值：`Double`、`Single` 和 `Char`。

trans-unit.source: However, not all languages support operator overloading or the definition of custom operators.
trans-unit.target: 但是，并非所有语言都支持运算符重载或定义自定义运算符。

trans-unit.source: If you choose to implement these conversion operators, you should also provide an alternate way to perform the conversion.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择实现这些转换运算符，您还应提供另一种执行转换的方法。

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you provide `From`Xxx and `To`Xxx methods.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议提供 `From`Xxx 和 `To`Xxx 方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines CLS-compliant implicit and explicit conversions.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义符合 CLS 的隐式和显式转换。

trans-unit.source: It creates a `UDouble`class that represents an signed double-precision, floating-point number.
trans-unit.target: 它创建表示带符号的双精度浮点数字的 `UDouble` 类。

trans-unit.source: It provides for implicit conversions from `UDouble` to `Double` and for explicit conversions from `UDouble` to `Single`, `Double` to `UDouble`, and `Single` to `UDouble`.
trans-unit.target: 它提供从 `UDouble` 到 `Double` 的隐式转换和从 `UDouble` 到 `Single`、从 `Double` 到 `UDouble` 以及从 `Single` 到 `UDouble` 的显式转换。

trans-unit.source: It also defines a `ToDouble` method as an alternative to the implicit conversion operator and the `ToSingle`, `FromDouble`, and `FromSingle` methods as alternatives to the explicit conversion operators.
trans-unit.target: 它还将 `ToDouble` 方法定义为隐式转换运算符的替代方法，并将 `ToSingle`、`FromDouble` 和 `FromSingle` 方法定义为显式转换运算符的替代方法。

trans-unit.source: Arrays
trans-unit.target: 数组

trans-unit.source: CLS-compliant arrays conform to the following rules:
trans-unit.target: 符合 CLS 的数组符合以下规则：

trans-unit.source: All dimensions of an array must have a lower bound of zero.
trans-unit.target: 数组的所有维度必须具有零下限。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a non-CLS-compliant array with a lower bound of one.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建一个不符合 CLS 的数组，其下限为 1。

trans-unit.source: Note that, despite the presence of the [CLSCompliantAttribute](xref:System.CLSCompliantAttribute) attribute, the compiler does not detect that the array returned by the `Numbers.GetTenPrimes` method is not CLS-compliant.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，无论是否存在 [CLSCompliantAttribute](xref:System.CLSCompliantAttribute) 特性，编译器都不检测由 `Numbers.GetTenPrimes` 方法返回的数组是否符合 CLS。

trans-unit.source: All array elements must consist of CLS-compliant types.
trans-unit.target: 所有数组元素必须包括符合 CLS 的类型。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines two methods that return non-CLS-compliant arrays.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义返回不符合 CLS 的数组的两种方法。

trans-unit.source: The first returns an array of [UInt32](xref:System.UInt32) values.
trans-unit.target: 第一个返回 [UInt32](xref:System.UInt32) 值的数组。

trans-unit.source: The second returns an [Object](xref:System.Object) array that includes [Int32](xref:System.Int32) and `UInt32` values.
trans-unit.target: 第二个返回包括 [Int32](xref:System.Int32) 和 `UInt32` 值的 [Object](xref:System.Object) 数组。

trans-unit.source: Although the compiler identifies the first array as non-compliant because of its `UInt32` type, it fails to recognize that the second array includes non-CLS-compliant elements.
trans-unit.target: 虽然编译器因第一个数组是 `UInt32` 类型而将其标识为不合规，但无法识别第二个包含不符合 CLS 元素的数组。

trans-unit.source: Overload resolution for methods that have array parameters is based on the fact that they are arrays and on their element type.
trans-unit.target: 具有数组参数的方法的重载决策基于它们是否为数组及它们的元素类型。

trans-unit.source: For this reason, the following definition of an overloaded `GetSquares` method is CLS-compliant.
trans-unit.target: 因此，以下对重载的 `GetSquares` 方法的定义符合 CLS。

trans-unit.source: Interfaces
trans-unit.target: 接口

trans-unit.source: CLS-compliant interfaces can define properties, events, and virtual methods (methods with no implementation).
trans-unit.target: 符合 CLS 的接口可以定义属性、事件和虚拟方法（没有实现的方法）。

trans-unit.source: A CLS-compliant interface cannot have any of the following:
trans-unit.target: 符合 CLS 的接口不能有：

trans-unit.source: Static methods or static fields.
trans-unit.target: 静态方法或静态字段。

trans-unit.source: The C# compiler generatse compiler errors if you define a static member in an interface.
trans-unit.target: 如果在接口中定义静态成员，C# 编译器将生成编译器错误。

trans-unit.source: Fields.
trans-unit.target: 字段。

trans-unit.source: The C# acompiler generates compiler errors if you define a field in an interface.
trans-unit.target: 如果在接口中定义字段，C# 编译器将生成编译器错误。

trans-unit.source: Methods that are not CLS-compliant.
trans-unit.target: 不符合 CLS 的方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following interface definition includes a method, `INumber.GetUnsigned`, that is marked as non-CLS-compliant.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下面的接口定义包括方法 `INumber.GetUnsigned`，该方法标记为不符合 CLS。

trans-unit.source: This example generates a compiler warning.
trans-unit.target: 此示例生成编译器警告。

trans-unit.source: Because of this rule, CLS-compliant types are not required to implement non-CLS-compliant members.
trans-unit.target: 由于存在此规则，因此符合 CLS 的类型不需要实现不符合 CLS 的成员。

trans-unit.source: If a CLS-compliant framework does expose a class that implements a non-CLS compliant interface, it should also provide concrete implementations of all non-CLS-compliant members.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个符合 CLS 的框架公开实现不符合 CLS 接口的类，则其还应提供所有不符合 CLS 的成员的具体实现。

trans-unit.source: CLS-compliant language compilers must also allow a class to provide separate implementations of members that have the same name and signature in multiple interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 符合 CLS 的语言编译器还必须允许类提供在多个接口中具有相同名称和签名的成员的单独实现。

trans-unit.source: C# supports explicit interface implementations to provide different implementations of identically named methods.
trans-unit.target: C# 支持使用显式接口实现来提供同名方法的不同实现。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates this scenario by defining a `Temperature` class that implements the `ICelsius` and `IFahrenheit` interfaces as explicit interface implementations.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例通过定义一个将 `Temperature` 和 `ICelsius` 接口作为显式接口实现的 `IFahrenheit` 类来说明此方案。

trans-unit.source: Enumerations
trans-unit.target: 枚举

trans-unit.source: CLS-compliant enumerations must follow these rules:
trans-unit.target: 符合 CLS 的枚举必须遵循下列规则：

trans-unit.source: The underlying type of the enumeration must be an intrinsic CLS-compliant integer ([Byte](xref:System.Byte), [Int16](xref:System.Int16), [Int32](xref:System.Int32), or [Int64](xref:System.Int64)).
trans-unit.target: 枚举的基础类型必须是符合 CLS 的内部整数（[Byte](xref:System.Byte)、[Int16](xref:System.Int16)、[Int32](xref:System.Int32) 或 [Int64](xref:System.Int64)）。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following code tries to define an enumeration whose underlying type is [UInt32](xref:System.UInt32) and generates a compiler warning.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下面的代码尝试定义基础类型为 [UInt32](xref:System.UInt32) 的枚举并生成编译器警告。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration type must have a single instance field named `Value__` that is marked with the `FieldAttributes.RTSpecialName` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 枚举类型必须具有名为 `Value__` 且标有 `FieldAttributes.RTSpecialName` 特性的单个实例字段。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to reference the field value implicitly.
trans-unit.target: 这使得您可以隐式引用字段值。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration includes literal static fields whose types match the type of the enumeration itself.
trans-unit.target: 枚举包括文本静态字段，该字段的类型与枚举本身的类型匹配。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you define a `State` enumeration with values of `State.On` and `State.Off`, `State.On` and `State.Off` are both literal static fields whose type is `State`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您用 `State` 和 `State.On` 的值定义 `State.Off` 枚举，则 `State.On` 和 `State.Off` 都是文本静态字段，其类型为 `State`。

trans-unit.source: There are two kinds of enumerations:
trans-unit.target: 有两种枚举：

trans-unit.source: An enumeration that represents a set of mutually exclusive, named integer values.
trans-unit.target: 一种表示一组互斥的命名整数值的枚举。

trans-unit.source: This type of enumeration is indicated by the absence of the [System.FlagsAttribute](xref:System.FlagsAttribute) custom attribute.
trans-unit.target: 这种类型的枚举由缺少 [System.FlagsAttribute](xref:System.FlagsAttribute) 自定义特性表示。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration that represents a set of bit flags that can combine to generate an unnamed value.
trans-unit.target: 一种表示可结合用来生成未命名值的一组位标志的枚举。

trans-unit.source: This type of enumeration is indicated by the presence of the [System.FlagsAttribute](xref:System.FlagsAttribute) custom attribute.
trans-unit.target: 这种类型的枚举由存在 [System.FlagsAttribute](xref:System.FlagsAttribute) 自定义特性表示。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the documentation for the [Enum](xref:System.Enum) structure.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Enum](xref:System.Enum) 结构的文档。

trans-unit.source: The value of an enumeration is not limited to the range of its specified values.
trans-unit.target: 枚举的值不限于其指定值的范围。

trans-unit.source: In other words, the range of values in an enumeration is the range of its underlying value.
trans-unit.target: 换言之，枚举中的值的范围是其基础值的范围。

trans-unit.source: You can use the `Enum.IsDefined` method to determine whether a specified value is a member of an enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 `Enum.IsDefined` 方法来确定指定的值是否为枚举成员。

trans-unit.source: Type members in general
trans-unit.target: 类型成员概述

trans-unit.source: The Common Language Specification requires all fields and methods to be accessed as members of a particular class.
trans-unit.target: 公共语言规范要求将所有字段和方法作为特定类的成员进行访问。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, global static fields and methods (that is, static fields or methods that are defined apart from a type) are not CLS-compliant.
trans-unit.target: 因此，全局静态字段和方法（即，除类型外定义的静态字段或方法）不符合 CLS。

trans-unit.source: If you try to include a global field or method in your source code, the C# compiler generates a compiler error.
trans-unit.target: 如果尝试在源代码中包括全局字段或方法，C# 编译器将生成编译器错误。

trans-unit.source: The Common Language Specification supports only the standard managed calling convention.
trans-unit.target: 公共语言规范仅支持标准托管调用约定。

trans-unit.source: It doesn't support unmanaged calling conventions and methods with variable argument lists marked with the `varargs` keyword.
trans-unit.target: 它不支持非托管调用约定和带使用 `varargs` 关键字标记的变量参数列表的方法。

trans-unit.source: For variable argument lists that are compatible with the standard managed calling convention, use the [ParamArrayAttribute](xref:System.ParamArrayAttribute) attribute or the individual language's implementation, such as the `params` keyword in C# and the `ParamArray` keyword in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 对于符合标准托管调用约定的变量自变量列表，请使用 [ParamArrayAttribute](xref:System.ParamArrayAttribute) 特性或单个语言的实现，如 C# 中的 `params` 关键字和 Visual Basic 中的 `ParamArray` 关键字。

trans-unit.source: Member accessibility
trans-unit.target: 成员可访问性

trans-unit.source: Overriding an inherited member cannot change the accessibility of that member.
trans-unit.target: 重写继承成员不能更改该成员的可访问性。

trans-unit.source: For example, a public method in a base class cannot be overridden by a private method in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 例如，无法在派生类中通过私有方法重写基类中的公共方法。

trans-unit.source: There is one exception: a `protected internal` (in C#) or `Protected Friend` (in Visual Basic) member in one assembly that is overridden by a type in a different assembly.
trans-unit.target: 有一个例外：由其他程序集中的类型重写的程序集中的 `protected internal`（在 C# 中）或 `Protected Friend`（在 Visual Basic 中）成员。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the accessibility of the override is `Protected`.
trans-unit.target: 在该示例中，重写的可访问性是 `Protected`。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the error that is generated when the [CLSCompliantAttribute](xref:System.CLSCompliantAttribute) attribute is set to `true`, and `Person`, which is a class derived from `Animal`, tries to change the accessibility of the `Species` property from public to private.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例说明了当 [CLSCompliantAttribute](xref:System.CLSCompliantAttribute) 特性设置为 `true`，并且 `Person`（它是派生自 `Animal` 的类）尝试将 `Species` 属性的可访问性从公开更改为私有时生成的错误。

trans-unit.source: The example compiles successfully if its accessibility is changed to public.
trans-unit.target: 如果该示例的可访问性更改为公共，则其编译成功。

trans-unit.source: Types in the signature of a member must be accessible whenever that member is accessible.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个成员是可访问的，则该成员签名中的类型必须是可访问的。

trans-unit.source: For example, this means that a public member cannot include a parameter whose type is private, protected, or internal.
trans-unit.target: 例如，这意味着公共成员不能包含类型是私有的、受保护的或内部的参数。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the compiler error that results when a `StringWrapper` class constructor exposes an internal `StringOperationType` enumeration value that determines how a string value should be wrapped.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例说明了当 `StringWrapper` 类构造函数公开一个用于确定如何包装字符串值的内部 `StringOperationType` 枚举值时出现的编译器错误。

trans-unit.source: Generic types and members
trans-unit.target: 泛型类型和成员

trans-unit.source: Nested types always have at least as many generic parameters as their enclosing type.
trans-unit.target: 嵌套类型拥有的泛型参数数目总是至少与封闭类型的一样多。

trans-unit.source: These correspond by position to the generic parameters in the enclosing type.
trans-unit.target: 它们按位置对应于封闭类型中的泛型参数。

trans-unit.source: The generic type can also include new generic parameters.
trans-unit.target: 泛型类型还可以包括新的泛型参数。

trans-unit.source: The relationship between the generic type parameters of a containing type and its nested types may be hidden by the syntax of individual languages.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含类型及其嵌套类型的泛型类型参数之间的关系可能由各种语言的语法隐藏。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a generic type `Outer<T>` contains two nested classes, `Inner1A` and `Inner1B<U>`.
trans-unit.target: 在下面的示例中，泛型类型 `Outer<T>` 包含两个嵌套的类：`Inner1A` 和 `Inner1B<U>`。

trans-unit.source: The calls to the `ToString` method, which each class inherits from `Object.ToString`, show that each nested class includes the type parameters of its containing class.
trans-unit.target: 对于每个类从 `ToString` 继承的 `Object.ToString` 方法的调用，表示每个嵌套的类包括其包含的类的类型参数。

trans-unit.source: Generic type names are encoded in the form *name*'*n*, where *name* is the type name, *`* is a character literal, and *n* is the number of parameters declared on the type, or, for nested generic types, the number of newly introduced type parameters.
trans-unit.target: 泛型类型名称采用 *name*'*n* 格式进行编码，其中 *name* 是类型名称，*`* 是字符文本，*n* 是在类型上声明的参数数目，或对于嵌套泛型类型为最近引入的类型参数的数目。

trans-unit.source: This encoding of generic type names is primarily of interest to developers who use reflection to access CLS-complaint generic types in a library.
trans-unit.target: 此泛型类型名称的编码主要对使用反射来访问库中符合 CLS 的泛型类型的开发人员很有用。

trans-unit.source: If constraints are applied to a generic type, any types used as constraints must also be CLS-compliant.
trans-unit.target: 如果将约束应用于泛型类型，则任何用作约束的类型也必须符合 CLS。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a class named `BaseClass` that is not CLS-compliant and a generic class named `BaseCollection` whose type parameter must derive from `BaseClass`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义一个名为 `BaseClass` 的不符合 CLS 的类和一个其类型参数必须派生自 `BaseCollection` 的名为 `BaseClass` 的泛型类。

trans-unit.source: But because `BaseClass`is not CLS-compliant, the compiler emits a warning.
trans-unit.target: 但由于 `BaseClass` 不符合 CLS，编译器会发出警告。

trans-unit.source: If a generic type is derived from a generic base type, it must redeclare any constraints so that it can guarantee that constraints on the base type are also satisfied.
trans-unit.target: 如果泛型类型派生自泛型基本类型，则其必须重新声明所有约束，以确保也满足对基本类型的约束。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a `Number<T>` that can represent any numeric type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义可表示任何数值类型的 `Number<T>`。

trans-unit.source: It also defines a `FloatingPoint<T>` class that represents a floating point value.
trans-unit.target: 它还定义表示浮点值的 `FloatingPoint<T>` 类。

trans-unit.source: However, the source code fails to compile, because it does not apply the constraint on `Number<T>` (that T must be a value type) to `FloatingPoint<T>`.
trans-unit.target: 但是，源代码无法编译，因为它未将 `Number<T>` 上（T 必须是值类型）的约束应用于 `FloatingPoint<T>`。

trans-unit.source: The example compiles successfully if the constraint is added to the `FloatingPoint<T>` class.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此约束添加到 `FloatingPoint<T>` 类中，则该示例成功编译。

trans-unit.source: The Common Language Specification imposes a conservative per-instantiation model for nested types and protected members.
trans-unit.target: 公共语言规范对嵌套类型和受保护成员规定了一个保守的按实例化模型。

trans-unit.source: Open generic types cannot expose fields or members with signatures that contain a specific instantiation of a nested, protected generic type.
trans-unit.target: 开放式泛型类型不能公开具有包含嵌套的、受保护的泛型类型的特定实例化的签名的字段或成员。

trans-unit.source: Non-generic types that extend a specific instantiation of a generic base class or interface cannot expose fields or members with signatures that contain a different instantiation of a nested, protected generic type.
trans-unit.target: 扩大泛型基类或接口的特定实例化的非泛型类型不能公开带签名的字段或成员，此类字段或成员包含嵌套的、受保护的泛型类型的不同实例化。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a generic type, `C1<T>`, and a protected class, `C1<T>.N`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义一个泛型类型 `C1<T>` 和一个受保护的类 `C1<T>.N`。

trans-unit.source: `C1<T>` has two methods, `M1` and `M2`.
trans-unit.target: `C1<T>` 有两种方法：`M1` 和 `M2`。

trans-unit.source: However, `M1` is not CLS-compliant because it tries to return a `C1<int>.N` object from `C1<T>`.
trans-unit.target: 但是，`M1` 并不符合 CLS，因为它尝试从 `C1<T>` 返回 `C1<int>.N` 对象。

trans-unit.source: A second class, `C2`, is derived from `C1<long>`.
trans-unit.target: 另一个名为 `C2` 的类派生自 `C1<long>`。

trans-unit.source: It has two methods, `M3` and `M4`.
trans-unit.target: 它有两种方法：`M3` 和 `M4`。

trans-unit.source: `M3` is not CLS-compliant because it tries to return a `C1<int>.N` object from a subclass of `C1<long>`.
trans-unit.target: `M3` 不符合 CLS，因为它尝试从 `C1<long>` 的子类中返回 `C1<int>.N` 对象。

trans-unit.source: Note that language compilers can be even more restrictive.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，语言编译器可具有更高限制。

trans-unit.source: In this example, Visual Basic displays an error when it tries to compile `M4`.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，Visual Basic 在尝试编译 `M4` 时显示错误。

trans-unit.source: Constructors
trans-unit.target: 构造函数

trans-unit.source: Constructors in CLS-compliant classes and structures must follow these rules:
trans-unit.target: 符合 CLS 的类和结构中的构造函数必须遵循下列规则：

trans-unit.source: A constructor of a derived class must call the instance constructor of its base class before it accesses inherited instance data.
trans-unit.target: 派生类的构造函数必须先调用其基类的实例构造函数，然后才能访问继承的实例数据。

trans-unit.source: This requirement is due to the fact that base class constructors are not inherited by their derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 存在此要求是因为基类构造函数并不由它们的派生类继承。

trans-unit.source: This rule does not apply to structures, which do not support direct inheritance.
trans-unit.target: 此规则不适用于不支持直接继承的结构。

trans-unit.source: Typically, compilers enforce this rule independently of CLS compliance, as the following example shows.
trans-unit.target: 通常，编译器独立地强制实施 CLS 遵从性的此规则，如下面的示例所示。

trans-unit.source: It creates a `Doctor` class that is derived from a `Person` class, but the `Doctor`class fails to call the `Person` class constructor to initialize inherited instance fields.
trans-unit.target: 它创建派生自 `Person` 类的 `Doctor` 类，但 `Doctor` 类无法调用 `Person` 类构造函数来初始化继承的实例字段。

trans-unit.source: An object constructor cannot be called except to create an object.
trans-unit.target: 只有在创建对象时才能调用对象构造函数。

trans-unit.source: In addition, an object cannot be initialized twice.
trans-unit.target: 此外，不能将一个对象初始化两次。

trans-unit.source: For example, this means that `Object.MemberwiseClone` must not call constructors.
trans-unit.target: 例如，这意味着 `Object.MemberwiseClone` 不得调用构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Properties
trans-unit.target: 属性

trans-unit.source: Properties in CLS-compliant types must follow these rules:
trans-unit.target: 符合 CLS 的类型的属性必须遵循下列规则：

trans-unit.source: A property must have a setter, a getter, or both.
trans-unit.target: 属性必须具有 setter 和/或 getter。

trans-unit.source: In an assembly, these are implemented as special methods, which means that they will appear as separate methods (the getter is named `get`\_*propertyname* and the setter is `set*\_*propertyname*) marked as `SpecialName` in the assembly's metadata.
trans-unit.target: 在程序集中，这些作为特殊方法实现，这意味着它们将显示为单独的方法。getter 命名为 `get`\_*propertyname*，setter 是元数据中的 `set*\_*propertyname*) marked as `SpecialName`。

trans-unit.source: The C# compiler enforces this rule automatically without the need to apply the [CLSCompliantAttribute](xref:System.CLSCompliantAttribute) attribute.
trans-unit.target: C# 编译器会自动实施此规则，无需应用 [CLSCompliantAttribute](xref:System.CLSCompliantAttribute) 特性。

trans-unit.source: A property's type is the return type of the property getter and the last argument of the setter.
trans-unit.target: 属性的类型是属性 getter 的返回类型和 setter 的最后一个自变量。

trans-unit.source: These types must be CLS compliant, and arguments cannot be assigned to the property by reference (that is, they cannot be managed pointers).
trans-unit.target: 这些类型必须符合 CLS，并且不能通过引用将参数分配到属性中（即它们不能为托管指针）。

trans-unit.source: If a property has both a getter and a setter, they must both be virtual, both static, or both instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性包含 getter 和 setter 两者，则它们必须都是虚拟的、静态的或实例。

trans-unit.source: The C# compiler automatically enforces this rule through property definition syntax.
trans-unit.target: C# 编译器通过它们的属性定义语法自动实施此规则。

trans-unit.source: Events
trans-unit.target: 事件

trans-unit.source: An event is defined by its name and its type.
trans-unit.target: 事件由其名称和类型定义。

trans-unit.source: The event type is a delegate that is used to indicate the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件类型是用于指示事件的委托。

trans-unit.source: For example, the `DbConnection.StateChange` event is of type `StateChangeEventHandler`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`DbConnection.StateChange` 事件的类型为 `StateChangeEventHandler`。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the event itself, three methods with names based on the event name provide the event's implementation and are marked as `SpecialName` in the assembly's metadata:
trans-unit.target: 除事件本身外，带有基于事件名称的名称的三种方法提供事件的实现并在程序集的元数据中标记为 `SpecialName`：

trans-unit.source: A method for adding an event handler, named `add`_*EventName*.
trans-unit.target: 用于添加事件处理程序的名为 `add`_*EventName* 的方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, the event subscription method for the `DbConnection.StateChange` event is named `add_StateChange`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`DbConnection.StateChange` 事件的事件订阅方法名为 `add_StateChange`。

trans-unit.source: A method for removing an event handler, named `remove`_*EventName*.
trans-unit.target: 用于移除事件处理程序的名为 `remove`_*EventName* 的方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, the removal method for the `DbConnection.StateChange` event is named `remove_StateChange`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`DbConnection.StateChange` 事件的移除方法名为 `remove_StateChange`。

trans-unit.source: A method for indicating that the event has occurred, named `raise`_*EventName*.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示事件已发生的名为 `raise`_*EventName* 的方法。

trans-unit.source: Most of the Common Language Specification's rules regarding events are implemented by language compilers and are transparent to component developers.
trans-unit.target: 大多数关于事件的公共语言规范的规则都通过语言编译器实施，且对组件开发人员是透明的。

trans-unit.source: The methods for adding, removing, and raising the event must have the same accessibility.
trans-unit.target: 用于添加、移除和引发事件的方法必须拥有相同的可访问性。

trans-unit.source: They must also all be static, instance, or virtual.
trans-unit.target: 它们还必须都为静态、实例或虚拟的。

trans-unit.source: The methods for adding and removing an event have one parameter whose type is the event delegate type.
trans-unit.target: 用于添加和移除事件的方法具有一个类型为事件委托类型的参数。

trans-unit.source: The add and remove methods must both be present or both be absent.
trans-unit.target: 添加和移除方法必须同时存在或同时不存在。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a CLS-compliant class named `Temperature` that raises a `TemperatureChanged` event if the change in temperature between two readings equals or exceeds a threshold value.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个读取之间的温度更改等于或超过阈值，则下面的示例将定义一个名为 `Temperature` 的类，该类会引发 `TemperatureChanged` 事件且符合 CLS。

trans-unit.source: The `Temperature` class explicitly defines a `raise_TemperatureChanged` method so that it can selectively execute event handlers.
trans-unit.target: `Temperature` 类显式定义 `raise_TemperatureChanged` 方法，以便其可以有选择地执行事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Overloads
trans-unit.target: Overloads

trans-unit.source: The Common Language Specification imposes the following requirements on overloaded members:
trans-unit.target: 公共语言规范对重载成员有下列要求：

trans-unit.source: Members can be overloaded based on the number of parameters and the type of any parameter.
trans-unit.target: 成员可以根据参数数量和任何参数的类型进行重载。

trans-unit.source: Calling convention, return type, custom modifiers applied to the method or its parameter, and whether parameters are passed by value or by reference are not considered when differentiating between overloads.
trans-unit.target: 在重载间进行区分时，不考虑应用于方法或其参数的调用约定、返回类型、自定义修饰符，也不考虑是按照值还是引用传递参数。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see the code for the requirement that names must be unique within a scope in the [Naming conventions](#naming-conventions) section.
trans-unit.target: 有关示例，请参阅[命名约定](#naming-conventions)部分中名称在范围内必须是唯一的代码需求。

trans-unit.source: Only properties and methods can be overloaded.
trans-unit.target: 只可重载属性和方法。

trans-unit.source: Fields and events cannot be overloaded.
trans-unit.target: 无法重载字段和事件。

trans-unit.source: Generic methods can be overloaded based on the number of their generic parameters.
trans-unit.target: 泛型方法可以基于其泛型参数的数目进行重载。

trans-unit.source: The `op_Explicit` and `op_Implicit` operators are exceptions to the rule that return value is not considered part of a method signature for overload resolution.
trans-unit.target: `op_Explicit` 和 `op_Implicit` 运算符是返回值不被视为重载决策的方法签名的一部分的规则的例外情况。

trans-unit.source: These two operators can be overloaded based on both their parameters and their return value.
trans-unit.target: 可以基于这两个运算符的参数和返回值对其进行重载。

trans-unit.source: Exceptions
trans-unit.target: 异常

trans-unit.source: Exception objects must derive from [System.Exception](xref:System.Exception) or from another type derived from `System.Exception`.
trans-unit.target: 异常对象必须从 [System.Exception](xref:System.Exception) 派生，或从派生自 `System.Exception` 的另一个类型派生。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the compiler error that results when a custom class named `ErrorClass` is used for exception handling.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例说明了当名为 `ErrorClass` 的自定义类用于异常处理时产生的编译器错误。

trans-unit.source: To correct this error, the `ErrorClass` class must inherit from `System.Exception`.
trans-unit.target: 若要更正此错误，`ErrorClass` 类必须继承自 `System.Exception`。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the Message property must be overridden.
trans-unit.target: 此外，必须重写 Message 属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example corrects these errors to define an `ErrorClass` class that is CLS-compliant.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例更正这些错误以定义符合 CLS 的 `ErrorClass` 类。

trans-unit.source: Attributes
trans-unit.target: 特性

trans-unit.source: In.NET Framework assemblies, custom attributes provide an extensible mechanism for storing custom attributes and retrieving metadata about programming objects, such as assemblies, types, members, and method parameters.
trans-unit.target: 在 .NET Framework 程序集中，自定义特性提供了一个可扩展机制，用于存储自定义特性和检索有关编程对象（如程序集、类型、成员和方法参数）的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Custom attributes must derive from [System.Attribute](xref:System.Attribute) or from a type derived from `System.Attribute`.
trans-unit.target: 自定义特性必须从 [System.Attribute](xref:System.Attribute) 派生或从派生自 `System.Attribute` 的类型派生。

trans-unit.source: The following example violates this rule.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例与此规则冲突。

trans-unit.source: It defines a `NumericAttribute` class that does not derive from `System.Attribute`.
trans-unit.target: 它定义了不是从 `NumericAttribute` 派生的 `System.Attribute` 类。

trans-unit.source: Note that a compiler error results only when the non-CLS-compliant attribute is applied, not when the class is defined.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，编译器错误仅当应用不符合 CLS 的特性时会出现，而在定义类时不会出现。

trans-unit.source: The constructor or the properties of a CLS-compliant attribute can expose only the following types:
trans-unit.target: 构造函数或符合 CLS 的特性的属性只能公开以下类型：

trans-unit.source: [Boolean](xref:System.Boolean)
trans-unit.target: [布尔值](xref:System.Boolean)

trans-unit.source: [Byte](xref:System.Byte)
trans-unit.target: [Byte](xref:System.Byte)

trans-unit.source: [Char](xref:System.Char)
trans-unit.target: [Char](xref:System.Char)

trans-unit.source: [Double](xref:System.Double)
trans-unit.target: [双精度](xref:System.Double)

trans-unit.source: [Int16](xref:System.Int16)
trans-unit.target: [Int16](xref:System.Int16)

trans-unit.source: [Int32](xref:System.Int32)
trans-unit.target: [Int32](xref:System.Int32)

trans-unit.source: [Int64](xref:System.Int64)
trans-unit.target: [Int64](xref:System.Int64)

trans-unit.source: [Single](xref:System.Single)
trans-unit.target: [单精度](xref:System.Single)

trans-unit.source: [String](xref:System.String)
trans-unit.target: [字符串](xref:System.String)

trans-unit.source: [Type](xref:System.Type)
trans-unit.target: [类型](xref:System.Type)

trans-unit.source: Any enumeration type whose underlying type is `Byte`, `Int16`, `Int32`, or `Int64`.
trans-unit.target: 基础类型为 `Byte`、`Int16`、`Int32` 或 `Int64` 的任意枚举类型。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a `DescriptionAttribute` class that derives from [Attribute](xref:System.Attribute).
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义了从 [Attribute](xref:System.Attribute) 派生的 `DescriptionAttribute` 类。

trans-unit.source: The class constructor has a parameter of type `Descriptor`, so the class is not CLS-compliant.
trans-unit.target: 类构造函数具有 `Descriptor` 类型的参数，因此，该类不符合 CLS。

trans-unit.source: Note that the C# compiler emits a warning but compiles successfully.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，C# 编译器会发出警告，但编译成功。

trans-unit.source: The CLSCompliantAttribute attribute
trans-unit.target: CLSCompliantAttribute 特性

trans-unit.source: The [CLSCompliantAttribute](xref:System.CLSCompliantAttribute) attribute is used to indicate whether a program element complies with the Common Language Specification.
trans-unit.target: [CLSCompliantAttribute](xref:System.CLSCompliantAttribute) 特性用于指示程序元素是否使用公共语言规范进行编译。

trans-unit.source: The `CLSCompliantAttribute.CLSCompliantAttribute(Boolean)` constructor includes a single required parameter, *isCompliant*, that indicates whether the program element is CLS-compliant.
trans-unit.target: `CLSCompliantAttribute.CLSCompliantAttribute(Boolean)` 构造函数包含一个必需的参数 *isCompliant*，此参数指示该程序元素是否符合 CLS。

trans-unit.source: At compile time, the compiler detects non-compliant elements that are presumed to be CLS-compliant and emits a warning.
trans-unit.target: 编译时，编译器检测到假定为符合 CLS 的不合规元素，并发出警告。

trans-unit.source: The compiler does not emit warnings for types or members that are explicitly declared to be non-compliant.
trans-unit.target: 编译器不会对显式声明为不符合标准的类型或成员发出警告。

trans-unit.source: Component developers can use the `CLSCompliantAttribute` attribute in two ways:
trans-unit.target: 组件开发人员可以通过两种方法使用 `CLSCompliantAttribute` 特性：

trans-unit.source: To define the parts of the public interface exposed by a component that are CLS-compliant and the parts that are not CLS-compliant.
trans-unit.target: 定义由组件公开的公共接口的符合 CLS 的部件以及不符合 CLS 的部件。

trans-unit.source: When the attribute is used to mark particular program elements as CLS-compliant, its use guarantees that those elements are accessible from all languages and tools that target the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 如果特性用于将特定程序元素标记为符合 CLS，则使用该特性可保证能通过面向 .NET Framework 的所有语言和工具访问这些元素。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that the component library's public interface exposes only program elements that are CLS-compliant.
trans-unit.target: 确保组件库的公共接口仅公开符合 CLS 的程序元素。

trans-unit.source: If elements are not CLS-compliant, compilers will generally issue a warning.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素不符合 CLS，则编译器通常会发出一个警告。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, language compilers enforce CLS-compliant rules regardless of whether the `CLSCompliantAttribute` attribute is used.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，语言编译器执行符合 CLS 的规则，而不管是否使用 `CLSCompliantAttribute` 特性。

trans-unit.source: For example, defining a `*static` member in an interface violates a CLS rule.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在接口中定义 `*static` 成员会违反 CLS 规则。

trans-unit.source: However, if you define a `*static` member in an interface, the C# compiler displays an error message and fails to compile the app.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果在接口中定义 `*static` 成员，C# 编译器会显示错误消息且无法编译应用。

trans-unit.source: The `CLSCompliantAttribute` attribute is marked with an [AttributeUsageAttribute](xref:System.AttributeUsageAttribute) attribute that has a value of `AttributeTargets.All`.
trans-unit.target: `CLSCompliantAttribute` 特性标记为具有 `AttributeTargets.All` 值的 [AttributeUsageAttribute](xref:System.AttributeUsageAttribute) 特性。

trans-unit.source: This value allows you to apply the `CLSCompliantAttribute` attribute to any program element, including assemblies, modules, types (classes, structures, enumerations, interfaces, and delegates), type members (constructors, methods, properties, fields, and events), parameters, generic parameters, and return values.
trans-unit.target: 利用此值，您可以将 `CLSCompliantAttribute` 特性应用于任何程序元素，包括程序集、模块、类型（类、结构、枚举、接口和委托）、类型成员（构造函数、方法、属性、字段和事件）、参数、泛型参数和返回值。

trans-unit.source: However, in practice, you should apply the attribute only to assemblies, types, and type members.
trans-unit.target: 但实际上，您只应将该特性应用于程序集、类型和类型成员。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, compilers ignore the attribute and continue to generate compiler warnings whenever they encounter a non-compliant parameter, generic parameter, or return value in your library's public interface.
trans-unit.target: 否则，编译器在库的公共接口中遇到不符合标准的参数、泛型参数或返回值时，将忽略此特性并继续生成编译器警告。

trans-unit.source: The value of the `CLSCompliantAttribute` attribute is inherited by contained program elements.
trans-unit.target: `CLSCompliantAttribute` 特性的值由包含的程序元素继承。

trans-unit.source: For example, if an assembly is marked as CLS-compliant, its types are also CLS-compliant.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果程序集标记为符合 CLS，则其类型也符合 CLS。

trans-unit.source: If a type is marked as CLS-compliant, its nested types and members are also CLS-compliant.
trans-unit.target: 如果类型标记为符合 CLS，则其嵌套的类型和成员也符合 CLS。

trans-unit.source: You can explicitly override the inherited compliance by applying the `CLSCompliantAttribute` attribute to a contained program element.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过将 `CLSCompliantAttribute` 特性应用到包含的编程元素来显式重写继承的遵从性。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the `CLSCompliantAttribute` attribute with an *isCompliant* value of `false` to define a non-compliant type in a compliant assembly, and you can use the attribute with an *isComplian* value of `true` to define a compliant type in a non-compliant assembly.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以使用具有 *isCompliant* 值为 `false` 的 `CLSCompliantAttribute` 特性来定义符合标准的程序集中的不符合标准的类型，还可以使用 *isComplian* 值为 `true` 的特性来定义不符合标准的程序集中的符合标准的类型。

trans-unit.source: You can also define non-compliant members in a compliant type.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以在符合标准的类型中定义不符合标准的成员。

trans-unit.source: However, a non-compliant type cannot have compliant members, so you cannot use the attribute with an *isCompliant* value of `true` to override inheritance from a non-compliant type.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不符合标准的类型无法拥有符合标准的成员，因此无法使用 *isCompliant* 值为 `true` 的特性从一个不符合标准的类型重写继承。

trans-unit.source: When you are developing components, you should always use the `CLSCompliantAttribute` attribute to indicate whether your assembly, its types, and its members are CLS-compliant.
trans-unit.target: 在开发组件时，应始终使用 `CLSCompliantAttribute` 特性来指示您的程序集、其类型及其成员是否符合 CLS。

trans-unit.source: To create CLS-compliant components:
trans-unit.target: 创建符合 CLS 的组件：

trans-unit.source: Use the `CLSCompliantAttribute` to mark you assembly as CLS-compliant.
trans-unit.target: 使用 `CLSCompliantAttribute` 将程序集标记为符合 CLS。

trans-unit.source: Mark any publicly exposed types in the assembly that are not CLS-compliant as non-compliant.
trans-unit.target: 将程序集中不符合 CLS 的所有公开的类型标记为不符合标准。

trans-unit.source: Mark any publicly exposed members in CLS-compliant types as non-compliant.
trans-unit.target: 将符合 CLS 的类型中的所有公开的成员标记为不符合标准。

trans-unit.source: Provide a CLS-compliant alternative for non-CLS-compliant members.
trans-unit.target: 为不符合 CLS 的成员提供符合 CLS 的替代项。

trans-unit.source: If you've successfully marked all your non-compliant types and members, your compiler should not emit any non-compliance warnings.
trans-unit.target: 如果已成功标记所有不符合标准的类型和成员，您的编译器不会发出任何不符合警告。

trans-unit.source: However, you should indicate which members are not CLS-compliant and list their CLS-compliant alternatives in your product documentation.
trans-unit.target: 但是，您应指出哪些成员不符合 CLS 并在产品文档中列出其不符合 CLS 的替代项。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the `CLSCompliantAttribute` attribute to define a CLS-compliant assembly and a type, `CharacterUtilities`, that has two non-CLS-compliant members.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用 `CLSCompliantAttribute` 特性定义符合 CLS 的程序集和类型 `CharacterUtilities`，该类型具有两个不符合 CLS 的成员。

trans-unit.source: Because both members are tagged with the `CLSCompliant(false)` attribute, the compiler produces no warnings.
trans-unit.target: 由于这两个成员标记有 `CLSCompliant(false)` 特性，因此编译器不生成任何警告。

trans-unit.source: The class also provides a CLS-compliant alternative for both methods.
trans-unit.target: 该类还为两种方法提供符合 CLS 的替代项。

trans-unit.source: Ordinarily, we would just add two overloads to the `ToUTF16` method to provide CLS-compliant alternatives.
trans-unit.target: 通常，我们只向 `ToUTF16` 方法添加两个重载，以便提供符合 CLS 的替代项。

trans-unit.source: However, because methods cannot be overloaded based on return value, the names of the CLS-compliant methods are different from the names of the non-compliant methods.
trans-unit.target: 但是，由于无法基于返回值重载这些方法，因此符合 CLS 的方法的名称不同于不符合标准的方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: If you are developing an app rather than a library (that is, if you aren't exposing types or members that can be consumed by other app developers), the CLS compliance of the program elements that your app consumes are of interest only if your language does not support them.
trans-unit.target: 如果您开发的是应用程序而不是库（即，如果不公开可由其他应用程序开发人员使用的类型或成员），则只有在您的语言不支持程序元素时，您的应用程序使用的程序元素的 CLS 遵从性才会引起关注。

trans-unit.source: In that case, your language compiler will generate an error when you try to use a non-CLS-compliant element.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，当您尝试使用不符合 CLS 的元素时，您的语言编译器将生成错误。

trans-unit.source: Cross-Language Interoperability
trans-unit.target: 跨语言互操作性

trans-unit.source: Language independence has a number of possible meanings.
trans-unit.target: 语言独立性可能有许多含义。

trans-unit.source: One meaning involves seamlessly consuming types written in one language from an app written in another language.
trans-unit.target: 其中一种含义涉及到从使用一种语言编写的应用取用以另一种语言编写的类型。

trans-unit.source: A second meaning, which is the focus of this article, involves combining code written in multiple languages into a single .NET Framework assembly.
trans-unit.target: 本文介绍第二个含义，涉及将用多种语言编写的代码组合到一个 .NET Framework 程序集。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates cross-language interoperability by creating a class library named Utilities.dll that includes two classes, `NumericLib` and `StringLib`.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例通过创建一个名为 Utilities.dll 的包含两个类（`NumericLib` 和 `StringLib`）的类库演示了跨语言互操作性。

trans-unit.source: The `NumericLib` class is written in C#, and the `StringLib` class is written in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: `NumericLib` 类用 C# 编写类，`StringLib` 类用 Visual Basic 编写。
